entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dome Creek
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
